name: Dead Game (junko-valtine)
description:
Question for survey.  How do you feel about the scale of the spirtes. Is the size of the player abd objcets match the backgrounds?

Dead game is a demo of a walking simulator played in 2D. It is about James who has woken up in a strange office. This office is for a company of grim reapers- Grim corporation. You control James has he learns about his surroundings and meet many new faces. 

Controls: I will have keyboard controls at a later date but right now its just controller. 

A- To continue conversations.

B- To  inspect objects and speak to people

Y- to bring up a menu (this menu still needs to be set up)
